name: Paladin
description: You are earth's last hero - defend civilization from annihilation.Protect the cities, destroy the aliens and upgrade your fighter. Drive back the vile invading scum and save mankind in this frantic twin-stick shooter!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or newer Processor: Intel Core i3+ Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Shader Model 3.0 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 250 MB available space Sound Card: Required Additional Notes: .Net Framework 4
